description: This file provides classes and methods to map security rule identifiers to remediation guidance, helping users address detected security issues. It defines data structures for remediations and a remediator class that interfaces with specific rule-to-remediation mappings.

classes.name: Remediation
classes.description: Data class representing remediation details including rule identifier, title, and steps.

classes.name: Remediator
classes.description: Class providing a method to get remediation guidance based on a rule id.

methods.name: Optional[Remediation] for_rule(self, rule_id: Optional[str])
methods.description: Returns a Remediation instance for a given rule id, or None if no rule id is provided.
